param.type: template< class, template< class... > class, size_t > class...

briefdescription.para: A type function that selects a right method form.

detaileddescription.para: As parameters it takes a machine learning algorithm, a set of HasMethodForm structs, and a set of method forms. Method forms are passed to the internal struct From. The result type can be accessed through the Type member of the From struct.
The implementation basically loops through all combinations of the HasMethodForm structs and the method forms. It stops when a right combination succeeds, or when there are no more combinations.
